headline.main: Beyond Guantánamo, a Web of Prisons for Terrorism Inmates
headline.print_headline: Beyond Guantánamo, a Web of Prisons
headline.seo: Beyond Guantánamo, a Web of Prisons for Terrorism Inmates

docs.snippet: An archipelago of federal prisons that stretches across the country houses far more men convicted in terrorism cases than the shrunken population of the controversial prison in Cuba....
docs.lead_paragraph: An archipelago of federal prisons that stretches across the country houses far more men convicted in terrorism cases than the shrunken population of the controversial prison in Cuba.
docs.abstract: Network of federal prisons stretching across United States houses far more men convicted in terrorism cases than controversial prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; Congress has reignited debate over whether military justice is more appropriate for terrorism suspects, but criminal justice system has absorbed surge of terrorism cases since 2001 without calamity and without international criticism that Guantanamo has attracted for holding prisoners without trial.

headline.main: Behind the Bars of Supermax, Contemplating Aristotle and Islamic Extremism

docs.snippet: In the highest-security prison in the United States, known as the federal Supermax, one inmate writes about prison life and his views about Islamic extremism in a year-long written correspondence with a New York Times reporter....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the highest-security prison in the United States, known as the federal Supermax, one inmate writes about prison life and his views about Islamic extremism in a year-long written correspondence with a New York Times reporter.

docs.snippet: The Hall of Famer Gordie Howe filed a lawsuit over the loss of tapes, videos and personal documents....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hall of Famer Gordie Howe filed a lawsuit over the loss of tapes, videos and personal documents.

headline.main: On Russian TV, a Straightforward Account Is Startling
headline.print_headline: On Russian TV News, in Startling Shift, Straightforward Account of Day’s Events
headline.seo: Russian TV, Changing Its Strategy, Shows Protests

docs.snippet: Government television covered the protests much as they had occurred — to the surprise of many....
docs.lead_paragraph: Government television covered the protests much as they had occurred — to the surprise of many.
docs.abstract: Government-controlled television in Russia, in surprising shift, begins to cover the widespread demonstrations, as tens of thousands of people take to the streets to demand new elections; huge scale of protests seems to have forced the Kremlin to acknowledge public discontent.

docs.snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers signed first-round draft pick Nikola Vucevic and the second-round pick Lavoy Allen on the first day of N.B.A. training camp....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers signed first-round draft pick Nikola Vucevic and the second-round pick Lavoy Allen on the first day of N.B.A. training camp.

headline.main: Trailing After 1 Minute, Barcelona Is in First After 90
headline.print_headline: Trailing After 1 Minute, Barcelona Is in First After 90
headline.seo: Barcelona Rallies to Top Madrid in Clásico

docs.snippet: Barcelona overcame conceding one of the fastest goals in clasico history to end Real Madrid’s 15-match winning run in Bernabeu Stadium on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona overcame conceding one of the fastest goals in clasico history to end Real Madrid’s 15-match winning run in Bernabeu Stadium on Saturday.
docs.abstract: Barcelona defeats Real Madrid, 3-1, in European soccer; other soccer results noted.

headline.print_headline: Donald Closing In on European Money Title

docs.snippet: Top-ranked Luke Donald is on the verge of becoming the first golfer to win the European and American money titles, shooting a six-under-par 66 in the third round of the Dubai World Championship....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Luke Donald is on the verge of becoming the first golfer to win the European and American money titles, shooting a six-under-par 66 in the third round of the Dubai World Championship.
docs.abstract: Luke Donald, making a good showing at Dubai World Championship, is on the verge of becoming the first golfer to win both the European and American money titles.

headline.main: Talks Under Way in Pakistan, Taliban Say
headline.print_headline: Talks Under Way in Pakistan, Taliban Say
headline.seo: Taliban Leader Cites Peace Talks in Pakistan

docs.snippet: The deputy chief of the Pakistani Taliban said an end to its four-year insurgency was within striking distance....
docs.lead_paragraph: The deputy chief of the Pakistani Taliban said an end to its four-year insurgency was within striking distance.
docs.abstract: Deputy chief of the Pakistani Taliban announces that militant group is in peace talks with the government and that an agreement to end its brutal four-year insurgency is almost in place; statement appears timed to exploit tensions between the Pakistani Army and United States.

headline.main: Court Reverses Conviction of Man Jailed for 19 Years in Rape and Murder
headline.print_headline: Court Reverses Conviction of Man Jailed for 19 Years in Rape and Murder
headline.seo: Illinois Court Reverses Conviction of Man Jailed in Rape-Murder

docs.snippet: Juan Rivera, who has spent 19 years in prison for the 1992 rape and murder of Holly Staker, 11, in Illinois, was ordered freed in an opinion critical of the police and prosecutors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juan Rivera, who has spent 19 years in prison for the 1992 rape and murder of Holly Staker, 11, in Illinois, was ordered freed in an opinion critical of the police and prosecutors.
docs.abstract: Illinois appellate court reverses the conviction of Juan Rivera, who has spent 19 years in jail for the 1992 rape and murder of Holly Staker, an 11-year-old baby sitter, in a suburb of Chicago; the court's opinion is harshly critical of the police and prosecutors; Rivera has been convicted three times based on the strength of a confession that was obtained after four days of questioning, even though there was no physical evidence linking him to the crime and DNA testing in 2005 excluded him as the source of sperm found in body.

headline.main: Drafthouse Founder Tries Hand at Film Distribution
headline.print_headline: Drafthouse Founder Tries Hand at Film Distribution
headline.seo: Drafthouse Founder Tim League Tries Film Distribution

docs.snippet: Tim League, who created the Alamo Drafthouse movie-theater chain, is now a film distributor. With the whole indie-film genre not as healthy as it used to be, he’s taking quite a chance....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim League, who created the Alamo Drafthouse movie-theater chain, is now a film distributor. With the whole indie-film genre not as healthy as it used to be, he’s taking quite a chance.
